attributes.action: Close Down a New directory service with everyones Mobile Phone Number!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We undersign that a new directory service should be aborted before it has been fully launched. This service is an infrignment of our privacy under the data potection act. Anybody within the company has access to the numbers and can give out the number to anybody, We therefor request the government to closedown operation 118800.
